name: Baby Firetruck - Virtual Toy
description:
Baby Firetruck is a fun pretend play fire engine game for your little one. Have you ever noticed your kid getting curious about fire-trucks rushing past with sirens? Now you can let the little one play with one using this handy little app!

We also pre-loaded the app with carefully selected nursery rhymes for your kid's amusement. Your son or daughter will definitely love bobbing to the music and playing with nice smooth animations within this game!

Some of the features include:

- Play children songs in the music player
- Tap on various objects and get amusing sound effects
- Let your kid find hidden animations on tapping different parts of the truck.
- And much more!

This universal app is perfect for those with iPad whilst the iPhone version comes in handy whenever you need it.

Give it a try! You won't regret it!
